verbose_text: N-hCR-bearing-genes encoding complement proteins may also contribute to other disorders such as retinal degeneration through effects on C3 3N-hCR to multiple sclerosis through effects on C7 3N-hCR and to uptake of pathogens such as glycosylated viruses or bacteria by any of multiple members of the lectin and alternate complement pathway on XREF_TABLE such as CLEC6A, CLEC10A CLEC13B / LY75, MASP1 and C1QB.
evidence: glycosylated viruses or bacteria by any of multiple members of the lectin and alternate complement pathway on  XREF_TABLE  such as CLEC6A
